component.name: IdirFéin Desktop
component.summary: Desktop client for the IdirFéin syncing server

description.p: IdirFéin Desktop is a client for the IdirFéin sync server, written in Rust, with the Iced GUI library. It provides a photo gallery app with facial grouping and OCR, a markdown notes app, a task management app, a password manager based on KeePass, and a setup wizard to help you connect to or set up your IdirFéin server on a Raspberry Pi Zero.
